snippet: The audience will probably grow in the coming days as viewers tune in to watch the program, recorded and on demand.
abstract: Nielsen data reports that season finale of AMC television drama Mad Men became third-most-watched episode of show ever, drawing 3.3 million live and on same day viewers; audience numbers are likely to increase as more viewers watch show as recording or on demand.
lead_paragraph: The audience will probably grow in the coming days as viewers tune in to watch the program, recorded and on demand.

headline.main: ‘Mad Men’ Finale Draws 3.3 Million Same-Day Viewers
headline.print_headline: ‘Mad Men’ Finale Draws 3.3 Million So Far
